original_text: Jesus said to them, “Come and have breakfast.” Now none of the disciples dared ask him, “Who are you?” They knew it was the Lord.
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 와서 조반을 먹으라 하시니 제자들이 주님이신 줄 아는 고로 당신이 누구냐 감히 묻는 자가 없더라

sentences.original_text: Now none of the disciples dared ask him,
sentences.korean_translation: 제자들 중에 감히 그에게 묻는 자가 없으니,

sentences.original_text: They knew it was the Lord.
